dc:title: Manna Is Sometimes Rabbits
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An appeal for funds to pay bills and buy food. Describes those who are fed as Ambassadors of Christ.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 909 1945-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
